Nueva Era (Barcelona) [IAPSOP] About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Neuva Era (Barcelona) Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Nueva Era, La. Revista Mensual de Estudios Psicologicos. 1912--1914? Weekly (?), then monthly Sabadell (Barcelona), Spain. Language: Spanish. Editor: Angel Aguarod, Eduardo Pascual, Fabian Palasi. Corporate author: Organo Official de la Federacion Espiritista Española1/1, August 1912. 20 pp., 3 pesetas a year in Spain and 6 elsewhere. This was a Kardecist spiritist journal. Aguarod, its founder, was a prolific and tireless propagandist. He had earlier founded and directed El Espiritismo in Buenos Aires (1905-1912), and went on to direct Union Espiritista (Barcelona), Fraternidad (Alicante), La Antorcha del Progresso (Badalona), Eternidade and Boletim da Federacao Espirita do Rio Grande do Sul, while contributing to Luz y Union, Luz del Porvenir,Constancia, Fraternidad, Rosendo (Cuba), and others. BNE. Issues:Nueva Era V3 N4 Nov 1914
